scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client -c yellow,cyan "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
